attributes.action: ALLOW CASH TO BE LEGAL TENDER IN ALL SHOPS
attributes.additional_details: I want parliament to keep cash as legal tender and not be forced into using on line transactions
attributes.background: Allow  cash to be used in all shops and enforce all shops to comply with this law

rejection.details:
Legal tender is only applicable in very limited circumstances. You can find out more here:

https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/knowledgebank/what-is-legal-tender

You could start a petition requiring all shops to accept cash, if that's what you'd like to see happen.  If you do start that petition, you'll need to include your full name before we can publish it.
